scripts.deploy-hardhat: XDAI_DEX=true IS_NETWORK=local npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy_initial_contracts.js
scripts.deploy-xdai: XDAI_DEX=true IS_NETWORK=xdai npx hardhat run --network xdai scripts/deploy_initial_contracts.js
scripts.deploy-goerli: XDAI_DEX=false IS_NETWORK=goerli blockTime=15 npx hardhat run --network goerli scripts/deploy_initial_contracts.js
scripts.get-from-github-pages: git subtree pull --prefix xstarter-frontend/dist/spa origin github_pages
scripts.move-to-github-pages: git subtree push --prefix xstarter-frontend/dist/spa origin github_pages
